Economist Mikhail Delyagin, director of Moscow's Problems of ______ Institute, says bad working conditions, bureaucracy, and a lack of modernization are other factors driving away talent.
Marcelo D2 became famous when he created a new form of ______-hop by mixing it with the Brazilian music called samba.
The use of scientific knowledge in legal cases is called forensics, from the Latin term for a public ______.
If they had, they would have been tested to see if they needed treatment to prevent an infection like H.I.V.or ______.
A single ______ is when a bone is broken in just one place.
______ authors work on studies but are not credited.
A better idea is to ______ foods either early or late in the day, then leave them to cool naturally.
An end-stopped line is one in which the ______ unit of sense stops precisely at the end of the line. The next line of verse picks up a different thought and the next one after that, and so on.
result.chn: 孤联诗句到了句尾语法和句意,都刚好停止，下一句,又表达一个新的意思，下一句又是，依次类推。(弥尔顿课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: It's an acceptable stereotype to make a ______ from.
result.chn: 人们可以接受用这个刻板印象来以一概全。(心理学导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: I thought that we'd begin then by turning to page 731, the left-hand column, the ______.
result.chn: 现在我们可以开始了，翻到731页，看到左手边那一栏的脚注。(文学理论导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Hargreaves says this is a huge discovery, one that could ______ change how doctors treat pain.
He was ______ guilty of murder. Like those ______ guilty of plotting to kill Abraham Lincoln, he was hanged.
He says that he is a fool; I'm sorry, he tells this fable of the ______ and the nightingale, which illustrates really the doctrine of might over right.
result.chn: 他说自己是个愚人,抱歉,他讲了一个关于鹰和夜莺的寓言,它很好地阐释了,强权战胜正义这个信条(古希腊历史简介课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: This little felt thing there is just to avoid too much ______ from building up with the plastic or to keep it slightly separated from the case, but that's it. That's all there was to those things called floppy disks.
result.chn: 这种毡制品的目的是避免,由塑料组成所产生的摩擦力,或者保持稍微的距离，这就是我们要说的,软盘的全部内容。(计算机科学课程节选 : 哈佛公开课)

result.problem: You've got the model solutions, and there will be a test in recitation on Tuesday the 14th based upon that ______.
result.chn: 你们也有参考答案，在周二的背诵课上会有个测试,就是14号，基于你们的家庭作业。(固态化学导论课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)
